body:
@stgpetrovic Thanks for reporting and debugging this problem!

@coeuvre Since this is a crashing issue in Bazel that is very hard to debug, I'm assigning P1 to this issue. We should probably cherry pick the fix back to 6.3.0 when it's fixed.

issue.title: [6.3.0] Silent failure when credentials file is malformed

milestone.title: 6.3.0 release blockers
milestone.description: Issues that need to be resolved before the 6.3.0 release.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

body: @meteorcloudy SG, i am looking into this now.

issue.title: Properly handle invalid credential files

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
to prevent Bazel sever from crashing.

The functions used to construct credentials could throw runtime exception which will crash Bazel server in which case the Bazel client will just exit silently. 

Fixes #18755.

issue.title: [6.3.0] Properly handle invalid credential files

issue.body:
to prevent Bazel sever from crashing.

The functions used to construct credentials could throw runtime exception which will crash Bazel server in which case the Bazel client will just exit silently.

Fixes #18755.

Closes #18770.
